Posts.Content: Well done on getting through your treatment, I myself finished my T FEC chemo yesterday yipppeee, I have to have surgery now and then rads. I totally get how you feel from the body changes to to the emotional changes aswell. Be proud of yourself, when I left the chemo unit yesterday one of the nurses said to me if you can get through this you can get through anything, what wonderful people they are. Take care xxx
Posts.Title: Chemo done!
